metadata.subject: Divine right of kings
metadata.title: Arrest de la cour de Parlement du 2. Ianuier 1615. : touchant la souueraineté du roy au temporel, & contre la pernicieuse doctrine d'attenter aux personnes sacrées des roys : en suite duquel sont les arrests donnés sur le mesme subiect.
metadata.creator: France.Parlement (Paris)
France. Parlement (Paris)
Morel, Fédéric, approximately 1552-1630, printer
Mettayer, Pierre, d. 1639, printer
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez F. Morel, & P. Mettayer ..., 1615
metadata.description: Justification of the temporal power of the monarch. The arrests include condemnations of treatises by Tanquerel, Mariana, and Suarez
Bibl. Nat. Cat. de d'histoire de France, v. 1, p. 450
metadata.notes: Title and cover page are combined. Damaged, stained, marked, torn and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Text is lost in the binding or extends off of the edge of the page.
